org.spongepowered.api.world.extent.worker

Interface BiomeVolumeWorker<V extends BiomeVolume>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of volume being worked on
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableBiomeVolumeWorker<A>

    public interface BiomeVolumeWorker<V extends BiomeVolume>
    A worker for a biome volume. Used to perform operations on all the biomes it contains. When operations are done on multiple volumes, they are aligned on their minimum coordinates. The other volumes must be at least as big as the backing one.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V getVolume()
      Returns the volume this worker operates on.
      void iterate(BiomeVolumeVisitor<V> visitor)
      Iterates this biome volume, calling the visitor on each coordinate pair.
      void map(BiomeVolumeMapper mapper, MutableBiomeVolume destination)
      Applies a mapping operation to all the biomes in the volume and saves the results to the destination volume.
      void merge(BiomeVolume second, BiomeVolumeMerger merger, MutableBiomeVolume destination)
      Applies a merging operation to the biomes of the operating volume and an external one.
      <T> T reduce(BiomeVolumeReducer<T> reducer, BiFunction<T,T,T> merge, T identity)
      Applies a reduction operation to the volume.

    • Method Detail

      • getVolume

        V getVolume()
        Returns the volume this worker operates on.
        Returns:
        The backing volume

      • map

        void map(BiomeVolumeMapper mapper,
         MutableBiomeVolume destination)
        Applies a mapping operation to all the biomes in the volume and saves the results to the destination volume.
        Parameters:
        mapper - The mapping operation
        destination - The destination volume

      • merge

        void merge(BiomeVolume second,
           BiomeVolumeMerger merger,
           MutableBiomeVolume destination)
        Applies a merging operation to the biomes of the operating volume and an external one. Saves the results to the destination volume.
        Parameters:
        second - The volume to merge with
        merger - The merging operation
        destination - The destination volume

      • iterate

        void iterate(BiomeVolumeVisitor<V> visitor)
        Iterates this biome volume, calling the visitor on each coordinate pair.
        Parameters:
        visitor - The visitor

      • reduce

        <T> T reduce(BiomeVolumeReducer<T> reducer,
             BiFunction<T,T,T> merge,
             T identity)
        Applies a reduction operation to the volume. The identity should be the result of no reduction being applied. For example, the additive identity is 0, the multiplicative one is 1 and the set union one is the empty set.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the reduction
        Parameters:
        reducer - The reducing operation
        merge - Merges two reductions into one
        identity - The identity of the operation
        Returns:
        The reduction
